homePage.description: Masterskaya is a record label of free music format, founded by Ivan Dorn. And, soon, an open creative space. We act as a platform for the implementation of original, in our opinion, musicians.

error.title: Something went wrong.

studios.title: Studios
studios.description: In September, Ivan Dorn opened Masterskaya, his own recording studio and art space. Vogue.ua was the first to get acquainted with the team, as well as the brightest artists who collaborate with it, and Ivan Dorn composed poems about each character of our shooting.

training.title: Training
training.description: On the account of the label Masterskaya - releases of the most unusual artists. YUKO, Constantine, [O] - they are included in the lists of promising musicians, they are invited to top Ukrainian festivals and are invited to cooperate with world brands.

synthesizer.title: Synthesizers
synthesizer.description: From all over the world, instruments — synthesizers, drum sets, and pianos — are brought here. Compose music on them every fall can each musician. All you need is nothing: originality and directness. Any genre: from jazz to hip-hop.
